args.natural_language_statement: Let m* be the outer measure on R^n defined by m*(S) = inf { sum_{j=1}^\infty V(R_j) : S \subset \bigcup_{j=1}^\infty R_j, R_j open rectangles }. Define instead μ*(S) = inf { sum_{j\in I} V(R_j) : S \subset \bigcup_{j\in I} R_j, I finite or countably infinite, R_j open rectangles }. Prove that for every S \subset R^n, μ*(S) = m*(S).
